title: Nest "A"
marks: Signature, Title, Date, and Mark LLQ, in pencil: [Nest \"A\" / Rikio Takahashi / 1965
description: semicircular shape with ragged edges; overlapping layers of light blue and rust colors with irregular patters; darker layers of charcoal grey, blue, and purple overlap at LR area of circle; short \"tail\" of blue and rust juts out at LR of circle; charcoal grey form at LL of form
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Amy Kasai
